name: PwA v3.0.1 Rewind System improvements
description: A classic 1v1 Pong game rebuilt for online multiplayer with a deep augment system, using the Ably real-time network. One player creates a game and shares the ID, the other joins from anywhere with an internet connection. The game uses a host/client architecture where the creating player's browser calculates the game physics and acts as the source of truth.
